term.title: metallocenes

item.text: Organometallic coordination compounds in which one atom of a transition metal such as iron, ruthenium or osmium is bonded to and only to the face of two cyclopentadienyl [η5-(C5H5)] ligands which lie in parallel planes. The term should not be used for analogues having rings other than cyclopentadienyl as ligands. [image: Not defined]

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1349 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
